title: Office space usage
description: Design a pie chart to illustrate the division of office space usage by different departments, using 'goldenrod' for Administration, 'lightblue' for Human Resources, and 'thistle' for IT Services.
solution:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

color = ['goldenrod', 'lightblue', 'thistle']
plt.figure(figsize=(8,8))

plt.pie(df['office_space'], labels=df['department'], autopct="%1.1f%%", startangle=140, colors=color)
plt.title("Division of Office Space Usage by Department")
plt.show()
